title: Constance Zimmer: Entourage's Dana Gordon!
itunes:title: Constance Zimmer: Entourage's Dana Gordon!
description:
It feels so good to get our favorite Entourage couple back together again! Constance Zimmer and Jeremy relive the madness of Ari Gold and Dana Gordon's relationship and reveal untold stories from set.

Catch Constance on "Big Sky" Thursdays on ABC & HULU and the season premiere of "Good Trouble" on Wednesday March 9th. 

We want to hear from you! Leave us voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven and you could have your question answered on a future episode.

IG: @HowULivinJPivenPodcast
Twitter: @howulivinjpiv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Constance's IG: https://www.instagram.com/constancezimmer/?hl=en

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
